accept.description: Hint for expected file type in file upload controls

alt.description: alt attribute for the image type. Required for accessibility

autocapitalize.type: all except url, email, and password
autocapitalize.description: Controls automatic capitalization in inputted text.

autocomplete.type: all except checkbox, radio, and buttons

capture.description: Media capture input method in file upload controls

checked.description: Whether the command or control is checked

dirname.type: hidden, text, search, url, tel, email
dirname.description: Name of form field to use for sending the element's directionality in form submission

disabled.description: Whether the form control is disabled

form.description: Associates the control with a form element

formaction.description: URL to use for form submission

formenctype.description: Form data set encoding type to use for form submission

formmethod.description: HTTP method to use for form submission

formnovalidate.description: Bypass form control validation for form submission

height.description: Same as height attribute for ; vertical dimension

list.type: all except hidden, password, checkbox, radio, and buttons
list.description: Value of the id attribute of the <datalist> of autocomplete options

max.type: date, month, week, time, datetime-local, number, range

maxlength.type: text, search, url, tel, email, password
maxlength.description: Maximum length (number of characters) of value

min.type: date, month, week, time, datetime-local, number, range

minlength.type: text, search, url, tel, email, password
minlength.description: Minimum length (number of characters) of value

multiple.description: Boolean. Whether to allow multiple values

name.description: Name of the form control. Submitted with the form as part of a name/value pair

pattern.type: text, search, url, tel, email, password
pattern.description: Pattern the value must match to be valid

placeholder.type: text, search, url, tel, email, password, number
placeholder.description: Text that appears in the form control when it has no value set

popovertarget.description: Designates an <input type='button'> as a control for a popover element

popovertargetaction.description: Specifies the action that a popover control should perform

readonly.type: all except hidden, range, color, checkbox, radio, and buttons
readonly.description: Boolean. The value is not editable

required.type: all except hidden, range, color, and buttons
required.description: Boolean. A value is required or must be checked for the form to be submittable

size.type: text, search, url, tel, email, password

src.description: Same as src attribute for ; address of image resource

step.type: date, month, week, time, datetime-local, number, range

value.description: The value of the control. When specified in the HTML, corresponds to the initial value
